The funeral of U: S. Rep. John Lewis drew several former American presidents, including Bill Clinton, who spoke during the service. Clinton did not wear a face covering as he addressed the people who had gathered to mourn the congressman and civil rights leader.
However: while Clinton was seated in the pews of Ebenezer Baptist Church in Atlanta, his mouth and nose were covered by a mask.
The photo in the Facebook post is five y: Jesse Jackson's mother at the Springfield Baptist Church in Greenville, S.C. It shows Clinton sitting next to Rev. Jesse Jackson, not at John Lewis' funeral.
Getty Images photos from Lewis: s funeral show people wearing masks, contradicting the claim made in the Facebook post.
